DOC.brief_summary: A prospective cohort pilot study non-cardiac patient determine feasibility recruit 150 patient undergo postoperative continuous hemodynamic monitoring 3 day .
DOC.detailed_description: Patient start wear Philips ' hemodynamic ECG monitor Post Anaesthesia Care Unit ( PACU ) . This device continuously measure heart rate , pulse oxymetry , ST-segments . The device measure blood pressure every hour 7 10 pm every 2 hour 10 pm 7 . Patients postoperative Troponin I monitor telephone follow-up 30 day postop .
